channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Our Favorite Internal SSD Is on Sale Right Now

item.title: Costa Rica Is Saving Forest Ecosystems by Listening to Them

item.title: No, Even the Best Wi-Fi Extender Isn’t Worth Your Time (2025)
item.description: We spent hours testing Wi-Fi extenders, but they failed to impress. There are better ways to improve your internet coverage.
